titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: CDS BULK REPLACEMENT GROUP CODE - Description

div.p: The Commissioning Data Set Group into which CDS Types must be grouped when using the Commissioning Data Set Bulk Replacement Update Mechanism.
National Code 160 'Emergency Care Attendance' is only valid for:

div.xref: CDS V6-2-1 Type 005B - Commissioning Data Set Transaction Header Group - Bulk Update Protocol
CDS V6-2-1 Type 005N - Commissioning Data Set Transaction Header Group - Net Change Protocol
CDS V6-2-2 Type 005B - Commissioning Data Set Transaction Header Group - Bulk Update Protocol
CDS V6-2-2 Type 005N - Commissioning Data Set Transaction Header Group - Net Change Protocol
CDS V6-2-3 Type 005B - Commissioning Data Set Transaction Header Group - Bulk Update Protocol
CDS V6-2-3 Type 005N - Commissioning Data Set Transaction Header Group - Net Change Protocol

div.p: National Code 140 'Accident and Emergency Attendance' will no longer be accepted from 01 November 2020.
